mapper.sql: UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, REPAYAMT, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID
mapper.insert: insert into shgoods (UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, REPAYAMT, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into shgoods
UUID,
CODE,
NAME,
TYPE,
STAT,
PICTURE,
DESCRIPTION,
PRICE,
DEPOSITAMT,
REPAYAMT,
LASTER,
LASTUPDTIME,
MEMO,
STOREUUID,

#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update shgoods
UUID = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT = #{record.stat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURE = #{record.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSITAMT = #{record.depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAYAMT = #{record.repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTER = #{record.laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDTIME = #{record.lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOREUUID = #{record.storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
${record.updateSql},

update shgoods set UUID = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT = #{record.stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PICTURE = #{record.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSITAMT = #{record.depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAYAMT = #{record.repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTER = #{record.laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDTIME = #{record.lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOREUUID = #{record.storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update shgoods
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSITAMT = #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAYAMT = #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTER = #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDTIME = #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update shgoods set CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSITAMT = #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAYAMT = #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTER = #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDTIME = #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from shgoods
order by ${orderByClause}

insert.if:
insert into shgoods (UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, REPAYAMT, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID) values
(#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
